name: MARIKO TOJO
what_you_do: Mariko Broome is a trauma-informed, NHS-accredited health coach who helps women rebuild calm, energy and confidence through food, nervous system support, community and small steps.
who_you_serve: Midlife women who are quietly exhausted, holding everything together but feel foggy, flat, or snappy, and don't want extremes, rigid plans, or toxic positivity.
seeking: The website does not explicitly state what partnerships or collaborations Mariko Broome is actively looking for.
offering: The website does not explicitly state what Mariko Broome offers to partners or collaborators.
social_proof: Mariko Broome is an NHS-accredited health coach with over 20 years of experience in health and wellbeing.
signature_programs: The website does not mention any named courses, books, frameworks, or certifications.
business_focus: Helping midlife women rebuild calm, energy, and confidence through holistic health coaching.
